subtitle: chelovek, uchenyĭ, grazhdanin
title: Valeriĭ Fedorovich Meshcheri︠a︡kov
publishers: Kharʹkovskiĭ nat︠s︡ionalʹnyĭ universitet im. V.N. Karazina

notes.value:
At head of title: Kharʹkovskiĭ nat︠s︡ionalʹnyĭ universitet imeni V.N. Karazina. Assot︠s︡iat︠s︡ii︠a︡ vypusknikov, prepodavateleĭ i druzeĭ Kharʹkovskogo nat︠s︡ionalʹnogo universiteta imeni V.N. Karazina. Kharʹkovskoe oblastnoe istoriko-arkheologicheskoe obshchestvo.

"Naukovo-populi︠a︡rne vydanni︠a︡"--Colophon.

Also includes V.F. Meshcheri︠a︡kov's works.

Includes bibliographical references.

Russian and Ukrainian.
